exposurecontrol: Programmed auto exposure Exposure compensation (±2.0 EV in steps of 1/3 EV)

waterproof: Capacity to shoot pictures underwater up to a depth of 18 m (59 ft) and for 60 minutes JIS / IEC protection class 8 (IPX8) equivalent (under Nikon testing conditions)
